summary: This API offers the ability to list products submitted by sellers in an Affiliate Partner campaign
description:
This API offers the ability to list products submitted by sellers in an Affiliate Partner campaign. Version
202405
  
API Testing Tool

query.description: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.
The partner identifier used in API requests. Retrieve this value by using the [Get Authorized Category Assets API] (https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/666012dd609d4402cc3be995).
The number of results to be returned per page.
An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the next_page_token from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.
The product review status. This an enumerated type with values: - PENDING - APPROVED - REJECTED - PENDING_CLOSED - CLOSED
Filter the product list by product name. If value of product_name is contained in product.name, the product will be included in the response.
Filter the product list by product ID. If value of product_id matches product.id, the product will be included in the response.
Filter the product list by shop name. If value of shop_name is contained in product.shop_name, the product will be included in the response.

Filter the product list by category ID. If value of category_id matches product.category.id, or the product falls into the leaf category of the specified category, the product will be included in the response.

header.description: The partner access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 3. Follow this guide to get partner access_token.

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

children.description: The list of products.
The product identifier.
The product review status. This an enumerated type with values: - PENDING - APPROVED - REJECTED - PENDING_CLOSED - CLOSED
The product name.
The product image URL.
The lowest original price of all SKUs of this product.
The currency in the sales region.
The lowest price amount.
The highest original price of all SKUs of this product.
The currency code for the region in which the product is sold.
The highest price amount.
The number of in-stock units of all SKUs for this product.
The TikTok Shop name.
The total commission rate in hundredths of a percent (0.01%) units.
The creator commission rate in hundredths of a percent (0.01%) units.
The partner commission rate in hundredths of a percent (0.01%) units.
The product open collaboration commission rate in hundredths of a percent (0.01%) units.
Set to true if a product URL is available. Set to false if no product URL is available.
The total number of units sold of this product for this campaign.
The leaf category to which this product is associated.
The category identifier.
The category name.
The total amount of sample inventory available for allocation to creators by the seller.
A list of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) used to identify distinct variants of the product.
The name of the sku
The id of the sku
SKU inventory details.
The total SKU quantity available in the warehouse.
the base price of the sku
the region code of the sku

The currency of the SKU price. Possible values based on the region: - BRL: Brazil - EUR: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain - GBP: United Kingdom - IDR: Indonesia - JPY: Japan - MXN: Mexico - MYR: Malaysia - PHP: Philippines - SGD: Singapore - THB: Thailand - USD: United States - VND: Vietnam

The SKU's list price information that has been verified to be legitimate by the audit team. This is equivalent to the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP), or the recommended retail price (RRP).
The SKU's selling price, inclusive of tax. Applicable only for cross-border sellers from China.
localized dutiable price
region prices
the region code of the sku

The currency of the SKU price. Possible values based on the region: - BRL: Brazil - EUR: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain - GBP: United Kingdom - IDR: Indonesia - JPY: Japan - MXN: Mexico - MYR: Malaysia - PHP: Philippines - SGD: Singapore - THB: Thailand - USD: United States - VND: Vietnam

The SKU's list price information that has been verified to be legitimate by the audit team. This is equivalent to the manufacturer's suggested retail price (MSRP), or the recommended retail price (RRP).
The SKU's selling price, inclusive of tax. Applicable only for cross-border sellers from China.
localized dutiable price
The properties of the sku
the name of the property
the name of the value
Return product description
An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set.
The total number of products in the list.
